citphrases.citphrase: powers exercised by registrars of the court
review by court of registrar's exercise of power
exercise of discretion to order substituted service
nature of appearance in bankruptcy proceedings
application to set aside statutory demand

citances.sentence: An order for substituted service pursuant to Rule 10.24 , as with the former rule ( Hadgkiss v Aldin [2006] FCA 1164 at [3] per Nicholson J), must be based on a reasonable probability that it will inform the person served as a result of the form of service identified.
